data.title: Joyalukkas India Limited
data.text: Joyalukkas India Limited(JIL), is one of the largest Jewellery companies in India in terms of Revenue and Profit. Our Jewellery business include the sale of Jewellery made of Gold, Studded and other Jewellery products that include Diamond, Platinum, Silver and other Precious stones. We have a presence across multiple regions in India and with a focus on southern states. Our business was founded by Mr. Alukkas Varghese Joy who has over 35 years of experience in Jewellery Industry. We operate 95 showrooms across 70 cities in India. Today the group enjoys the patronage of millions of satisfied customers and a highly committed and satisfied team of over 9000 employees in 11 countries. The Joyalukkas group business interest other than their flagship Jewelelry business, includes Fashion Silks - Jolly Silks, Money exchange- Joyalukkas Money Exchange, Malls - Mall of Joy and Reality - Joyalukkas Lifestyle Developers.
